CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper November 18, 1961, pg. A10, reads: "Golden Year - The Rev. and Mrs. A. H. Favers will celebrate their 'Golden Wedding' anniversary, Nov. 26, with 'open house' for their hosts of friends. The Favers were married Nov. 22, 1911, in the Mt. Zion AME Church, Newman, Ga., by the Rev. W. O. Slade. Seven children, eight grandchildren and a great-granddaughter are descendants of the couple. The celebrants will welcome friends at their home, 2840 Webster Ave., at 4:30 P.M. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Rev. A. H. Favers and Mrs. Favers posed behind floral upholstered chair for their 50th wedding anniversary
